road_map.point_1: We'll spread the word about us on all Telegram channels and Twitter. Let everyone know who the real master is here.
road_map.point_2: Advertising in Telegram is our forte. We'll launch it to the max.
road_map.point_3: We'll organize farming and cool contests. It'll be fun and profitable.
road_map.point_4: We'll gather the most loyal army of shillers and influencers. Let them work for us.
road_map.point_5: We'll become a part of Ston.El, and let everyone be envious.
road_map.point_6: We'll update GeckoTerminal for better tracking of our successes.
road_map.point_7: We'll secure a spot on DexScreener and launch ads. Everything to the max.
road_map.point_8: We'll scatter $50K on promotion, shilling, and trends. Let everyone see that we're serious.
road_map.point_9: We'll include our token in Tonkeeper. Use it with ease.
road_map.point_10: We'll launch a staking round. Even more earning opportunities.
road_map.point_11: We'll get listed on CoinGecko. Let us get noticed.
road_map.point_12: We'll establish useful connections with other projects. Mutually beneficial relationships are always welcome.
road_map.point_13: We'll invite a creative director to give our project a unique style.
road_map.point_14: We'll use the most unexpected advertising tactics. Everyone will talk about us.
road_map.point_15: We'll become part of CoinMarketCap. Another milestone achieved.
road_map.point_16: We'll push our project to the top of all possible rankings. We are the leaders.
road_map.point_17: We're preparing something special for our dedicated fans. Details to come.
road_map.point_18: We're creating a premium chat for the select few. Only the best of the best.
road_map.point_19: We'll update our Roadmap. Plans change, and we grow.
